virtual i2d::CRect iview::CShapeBase::CalcBoundingBox ( ) const [protected, pure virtual]

Calculate bounding box.

You have to implement this method in your shapes implementations.

Implemented in iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CNoneCalibrationShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, iview::CImageShape, iview::CInteractiveCenterPinShape, iview::CInteractivePerspectiveCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveSplineShape, and iview::CPolypointShape.

void iview::CShapeBase::DisconnectDisplay ( ) [protected]
virtual i2d::CRect iview::CShapeBase::GetBoundingBox ( ) const [virtual]

Return bounding box in client window coordinates.

You can store this bounding box for optimisation, because about every change of transformation you will be informed by calling OnDisplayChange(int) method.

Implements iview::IShape.

virtual int iview::CShapeBase::GetDisplayChangesMask ( ) [protected, virtual]

Get display changes mask.

Only changes there are in mask will be accepted, rest will be ignored.

Reimplemented in iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, and iview::CCalibrationShapeBase.

virtual void iview::CShapeBase::InvalidateBoundingBox ( ) [protected, virtual]

Invalidate bounding box.

You can overload this method to provide validation of your internal attributes, because this method is called from Invalidate(int) and OnDisplayChange(int) methods. Please don't forget base method call in your implementations.

Reimplemented in iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, and iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape.

virtual ITouchable::TouchState iview::CShapeBase::IsTouched ( istd::CIndex2d  position) const [virtual]

Check, if any shape is touched.

When shape is touched, it return also pointer to this shape.

Returns:
touch state for the shape, or iview::IInteractiveShape::TS_NONE, when nothing found.

Implements iview::ITouchable.

virtual bool iview::CShapeBase::OnAttached ( imod::IModel *  modelPtr) [virtual]

This call back function will be called, if an observable object is about to be attached.

This function returns a true, if observable object is accepted by the implementation logic of the observer, otherwise the function returns a false.

Reimplemented from imod::CSingleModelObserverBase.

Reimplemented in iview::CInteractiveParallelogramShape, iview::CInteractiveTransformableRectangleShape, iview::CInteractiveLabelShape, iview::CTransformableRectangleCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePolygonShape, iview::CInteractiveShapeBase, iview::CPolygonCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusShape, iview::CImageShape, iview::CInteractiveArrowShape, iview::CInteractiveCircleShape, iview::CInteractiveRectangleShape, iview::CInteractiveAnnulusSegmentShape, iview::CPinCalibrationShape, iqtgui::TGuiObserverWrap< CViewProviderGuiComp, iview::CImageShape >, iview::CPolylineCalibrationShape, iview::CInteractivePinShape, iview::CInteractivePolylineShape, iview::CPolypointShape, and iview::CInteractiveSplineShape.
